entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:52 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 12:52 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:52 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
